title: Large-Scale Science MOOC Design Applying Evidence-Based E-Learning Principles

context.additional_context: An asynchronous learning environment promoting learner autonomy and interaction, requiring structured design emphasizing content organization and delivery methods

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher participation rate in MOOCs designed based on e-learning principles
Learners master key science concepts at 75% or higher proficiency through formative assessments (quizzes, assignments)
Learners engage in peer interactions at least twice weekly through peer review and discussion forums
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
